dc_creator_sm: United States. Post Office Department http://id.loc.gov/authorities/names/n80013583 http://viaf.org/viaf/155868670
dc_description_s: 1 map on 2 sheets : col., dissected ; 146 x 93 cm., folded to 20 x 13 cm.|Longitude east from Washington, D.C.; latitude north from the equator. Also gives time differential for longitudes.|Boundaries of states and some postal routes in color.|Backed on linen.|Includes a table of distances and a table of general statistics for 1860 and 1866.|Railroad routes shown.|Drawn by P. Goepel and engraved by D. McClelland.|"The service on this diagram brought up to date of Decr 29th 1866."|Official seal of Post Office Department on piece.
